description: Numbers that are both primitively and imprimitively represented by x^2+y^2+z^2.
formula: Union of A034046 and A034047 is A000378. Intersection of A047449 and A034043 is A034046. Numbers that are in A000378 and neither squarefree nor congruent to 0 mod 4. - _Ray Chandler_, Sep 05 2004
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
